name: Chambers of Horrors
overview: As a cunning thief you must use your agility and strength to negotiate the terrain in order to steal a gold Egyptian idol. En route you will encounter Giant Spiders, Killer Crabs, Razor-Edged Stalagmites, Poison Weeds, Bubbling Marshes and a Bottomless Pit and a Giant Eagle to help you fly over the stalagmites. Finally you must enter the central chamber and grab the idol before all hell breaks loose.
